articles.description: All the latest football news as the Premier League returns plus reaction to Thursday's Women's Champions League action.
articles.title: Premier League returns: Manager news conferences including Guardiola, Ten Hag & Slot

articles.description: England are spun out by Pakistan to lose the second Test by 152 runs, setting up a series decider in Rawalpindi next week.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Noman Ali and Sajid Khan dominate in Multan victory

articles.description: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe says he was not contacted by the Football Association in their recent hunt for a new England manager.
articles.title: Eddie Howe: Newcastle manager was not interviewed for England job

articles.description: Ex-Brighton and Chelsea boss Graham Potter tells BBC Sport why Chelsea are now seeing the best of Moises Caicedo after his £100m move.
articles.title: Moises Caicedo: Graham Potter on how Chelsea are now seeing best of £100m midfielder

articles.description: After being dubbed the Manchester United of the NFL during their dominance, the New England Patriots hope for a smoother rebuilding process.
articles.title: New England Patriots vs Jacksonville Jaguars: How the Pats rebuild after Brady & Belichick

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says the club are looking into Alisson Becker's injury issues after the Brazil goalkeeper suffered hamstring damage.
articles.title: Liverpool looking into Alisson Becker injury issues - Arne Slot

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles San Diego Wave and United States defender Naomi Girma, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 award.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Naomi Girma

articles.description: Pakistan captain Shan Masood says he wants another spinning pitch for the third Test against England in Rawalpindi after such a surface helped his side set up a series decider.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Hosts want another spinning pitch in Rawalpindi for series decider

articles.description: Rafael Nadal says he feels emotionally prepared for ending his career at next month's Davis Cup Finals but the Spaniard will only contest the singles if he is "ready to win".
articles.title: Rafael Nadal 'emotionally ready' for ending his career at Davis Cup Finals

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on legendary boxing manager Kellie Maloney with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v legendary boxing manager Kellie Maloney
